title: The Curious Caterpillar
hook: One day, a little caterpillar named Coco saw a mysterious object in the garden. What could it be?
moral: Curiosity can lead to wonderful discoveries.
paragraphs: Once upon a time in a sunny garden, there lived a curious caterpillar named Coco. Coco loved exploring and learning new things.
One day, while wriggling through the leaves, Coco spotted a shiny object near a flower. "Hmm, what is that?" Coco wondered aloud.
Curiosity piqued, Coco approached the object cautiously. It turned out to be a beautiful butterfly wing that had fallen from a passing butterfly.
Coco felt a mix of awe and admiration. "Wow, I wonder what it feels like to fly with such wings," Coco said wistfully.
Determined to learn more, Coco spent days observing butterflies, practicing climbing, and eventually turned into a beautiful butterfly too.

en-pt.title: A Lagarta Curiosa
en-pt.moral: A curiosidade pode nos mostrar coisas maravilhosas.
en-pt.hook: Um dia, uma lagartixa chamada Coco viu um objeto misterioso no jardim. O que poderia ser?
paragraphs:
Era uma vez, num jardim ensolarado, vivia uma lagarta curiosa chamada Coco. Coco adorava explorar e descobrir coisas novas.
Certa vez, enquanto se contorcia pelas folhas, Coco avistou um objeto brilhante perto de uma flor. "Hmm, o que será isso?" Coco se perguntou em voz alta.
Curiosidade despertada, Coco se aproximou do objeto com cuidado. Era uma asa de borboleta bonita que havia caído de uma borboleta que passava.
Coco sentiu uma mistura de espanto e admiração. "Uau, fico imaginando como é voar com essas asas," disse Coco pensativamente.
Determinado a aprender mais, Coco passou dias observando borboletas, praticando subir em árvores e, por fim, se transformou em uma bela borboleta também.

id-en.hook: One day, a little caterpillar named Coco saw a mysterious object in the garden. What could it be?
id-en.moral: Curiosity can lead to wonderful discoveries.
id-en.title: The Curious Caterpillar
paragraphs:
Long time ago in happy garden, lived curious caterpillar named Coco. Coco liked exploring and learning new things.
One day, Coco was moving through the leaves when he saw something shiny by a flower. "Hmm, what is that?" Coco asked.
Coco was very curious and went close to the strange thing very carefully. It was a pretty wing from a butterfly that flew by.
Coco felt very amazed and thought the bird was so cool. "Wow, I wish I could fly like that bird," Coco dreamily expressed.
Coco really wanted to know more, so Coco watched butterflies, practiced climbing, and became a pretty butterfly too.

en-de.moral: Neugier kann zu wundervollen Entdeckungen führen.
en-de.title: Die neugierige Raupe
en-de.hook: Eines Tages sah eine kleine Raupe namens Coco ein geheimnisvolles Objekt im Garten. Was könnte das sein?
paragraphs:
Es war einmal in einem sonnigen Garten, da lebte eine neugierige Raupe namens Coco. Coco liebte es, Neues zu entdecken und zu lernen.
Eines Tages, während Coco durch die Blätter schlängelte, entdeckte sie etwas Glänzendes in der Nähe einer Blume. "Hmm, was ist das?" fragte sich Coco laut.
Neugierig geweckt, ging Coco vorsichtig auf das Objekt zu. Es stellte sich heraus, dass es ein schöner Schmetterlingsflügel war, der von einem vorbeifliegenden Schmetterling gefallen war.
Coco fühlte eine Mischung aus Ehrfurcht und Bewunderung. "Wow, ich frage mich, wie es sich anfühlt, mit solchen Flügeln zu fliegen," sagte Coco sehnsüchtig.
Entschlossen, mehr zu lernen, beobachtete Coco tagelang Schmetterlinge, übte das Klettern und verwandelte sich schließlich auch in einen schönen Schmetterling.

en-fr.title: La Chenille Curieuse
en-fr.moral: La curiosité peut te faire trouver des choses merveilleuses.
en-fr.hook: Un jour, une petite chenille nommée Coco a vu un objet mystérieux dans le jardin. Qu'est-ce que cela pourrait être?
paragraphs:
Il était une fois dans un jardin ensoleillé, vivait une chenille curieuse nommée Coco. Coco aimait explorer et apprendre de nouvelles choses.
Un jour, en se faufilant à travers les feuilles, Coco aperçut un objet brillant près d'une fleur. "Hmm, qu'est-ce que c'est?" se demanda Coco à voix haute.
Intrigué par la curiosité, Coco s'approcha de l'objet prudemment. C'était en fait une belle aile de papillon qui était tombée d'un papillon en vol.
Coco sentit un mélange d'émerveillement et d'admiration. "Waouh, je me demande ce que cela fait de voler avec de telles ailes," dit Coco rêveusement.
Déterminé à en apprendre davantage, Coco a passé des jours à observer les papillons, à pratiquer l'escalade, et est finalement devenu un magnifique papillon aussi.
